20101201024439.647|20101201024440.235|CCO|        
20101201024440.235|20101201024440.824|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101201024440.824|20101201024441.412|CCO|
20101201024441.412|20101201024442.000|CCO|    if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101201024442.000|20101201024442.625|CCO|    
20101201024442.625|20101201024443.250|CCO|      Protection that helps
20101201024443.250|20101201024443.875|CCO|        
20101201024443.875|20101201024444.500|CCO|            save lives.
20101201024444.500|20101201024445.125|CCO|    
20101201024445.125|20101201024445.750|CCO|        [ Female Announcer ]
20101201024445.750|20101201024446.375|CCO|    
20101201024446.375|20101201024447.000|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101201024447.000|20101201024447.625|CCO|    
20101201024447.625|20101201024448.250|CCO|        and some medicines,
20101201024448.250|20101201024448.875|CCO|    
20101201024448.875|20101201024449.500|CCO|          such as Prilosec,
20101201024449.500|20101201024450.125|CCO|    reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101201024450.125|20101201024450.750|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101201024450.750|20101201024451.375|CCO|
20101201024451.375|20101201024452.000|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.
20101201024452.000|20101201024452.625|CCO|    
20101201024452.625|20101201024453.250|CCO|        Your doctor may use
20101201024453.250|20101201024453.875|CCO|        
20101201024453.875|20101201024454.500|CCO|          genetic tests
20101201024454.500|20101201024455.125|CCO|

20101201024455.750|20101201024456.375|CCO|    
20101201024456.375|20101201024457.000|CCO|    Don't stop taking PLAVIX
20101201024457.000|20101201024457.625|CCO|
20101201024457.625|20101201024458.250|CCO|  without talking to your doctor
20101201024458.250|20101201024458.875|CCO|    as your risk of heart attack
20101201024458.875|20101201024459.500|CCO|    
20101201024459.500|20101201024500.125|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101201024500.125|20101201024500.750|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101201024500.750|20101201024501.375|CCO|
20101201024501.375|20101201024502.000|CCO|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101201024502.000|20101201024502.556|CCO|    
20101201024502.556|20101201024503.111|CCO|      should not use PLAVIX.
20101201024503.111|20101201024503.667|CCO|    
20101201024503.667|20101201024504.222|CCO|        Taking PLAVIX alone
20101201024504.222|20101201024504.778|CCO|
20101201024504.778|20101201024505.333|CCO|  or with some other medicines,
20101201024505.333|20101201024505.889|CCO|    
20101201024505.889|20101201024506.444|CCO|          including aspirin,
20101201024506.444|20101201024507.000|CCO|
20101201024507.000|20101201024507.556|CCO|    may increase bleeding risk,
20101201024507.556|20101201024508.111|CCO|

20101201024512.000|20101201024512.833|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101201024512.833|20101201024513.667|CCO|

20101201024514.500|20101201024515.333|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101201024515.333|20101201024516.167|CCO|    
20101201024516.167|20101201024517.000|CCO|      or confusion develops,
20101201024517.000|20101201024517.833|CCO|      tell your doctor promptly.
20101201024517.833|20101201024518.667|CCO|      These may be signs of TTP,
